name: varie-gate
description:
This is a prototype of the concept below and in no way represent the final game.

"You play as the main character that lives in a world with no color, a dystopian world. The main character must find and use color to fight back the mega corporation that are stealing the world’s color, the main enemy is robots, who use color as power and collect color from the world. The main objective of the main character is to destroy the mega corporation and release all color and give it back to the world. " 

The game is made as a hybrid of 2D and 3D, where all environment is made in 3D and character and other misc items are 2D.
